00036 #include "PACC/Util/Date.hpp"

00039 using namespace std;
00040 using namespace PACC;
00041 
00044 Date::Date(unsigned int inYear, unsigned int inMonth, unsigned int inDay) : mTime(0)
00045 {
00046     setDate(inYear, inMonth, inDay);
00047     setTime(0, 0, 0);
00048 }
00049 
00052 string Date::get(const string& inFormat) const
00053 {
00054 #ifdef PACC_USE_WINDOWS
00055     struct tm& lTime = *::localtime(&mTime);
00056 #else
00057     struct tm lTime;
00058     ::localtime_r(&mTime, &lTime);
00059 #endif
00060     int lBufSize = 128;
00061     char* lBuffer = new char[lBufSize];
00062     while(::strftime(lBuffer, lBufSize, inFormat.c_str(), &lTime) == 0) {
00063         // buffer needs to be enlarged
00064         delete[] lBuffer;
00065         lBuffer = new char[lBufSize*=2];
00066     }
00067     string lDate(lBuffer);
00068     delete[] lBuffer;
00069     return lDate;
00070 }
00071 
00074 unsigned int Date::getDayOfMonth(void) const
00075 {
00076 #ifdef PACC_USE_WINDOWS
00077     struct tm& lTime = *::localtime(&mTime);
00078 #else
00079     struct tm lTime;
00080     ::localtime_r(&mTime, &lTime);
00081 #endif
00082     return lTime.tm_mday;
00083 }

00088 {

00090     struct tm& lTime = *::localtime(&mTime);
00091 #else

00094 #endif
00095     return lTime.tm_wday;

00100 unsigned int Date::getDayOfYear(void) const
00101 {
00102 #ifdef PACC_USE_WINDOWS
00103     struct tm& lTime = *::localtime(&mTime);
00104 #else
00105     struct tm lTime;
00106     ::localtime_r(&mTime, &lTime);
00107 #endif
00108     return lTime.tm_yday+1;

00175 
00178 void Date::setDate(unsigned int inYear, unsigned int inMonth, unsigned int inDay)
00179 {
00180 #ifdef PACC_USE_WINDOWS
00181     struct tm& lTime = *::localtime(&mTime);
00182 #else
00183     struct tm lTime;
00184     ::localtime_r(&mTime, &lTime);
00185 #endif
00186     lTime.tm_year = inYear-1900;
00187     lTime.tm_mon = inMonth-1;
00188     lTime.tm_mday = inDay;
00189     mTime = ::mktime(&lTime);
00190 }
00191 
00194 void Date::setTime(unsigned int inHour, unsigned int inMinutes, unsigned int inSeconds)
00195 {
00196 #ifdef PACC_USE_WINDOWS
00197     struct tm& lTime = *::localtime(&mTime);
00198 #else
00199     struct tm lTime;
00200     ::localtime_r(&mTime, &lTime);
00201 #endif
00202     lTime.tm_hour = inHour;
00203     lTime.tm_min = inMinutes;
00204     lTime.tm_sec = inSeconds;
00205     mTime = ::mktime(&lTime);
00206 }
